reviewHighlights.text: This was one of the most (or the most) soul-crushing games I've ever played. The first 8-10 levels are fine enough. A match-3 style game where you can...
Lucky me! I get to write the first review for Fruit Juice, which is a basic Tetris/Match-3 ripoff where you Tetris blocks with fruit pictures on them....
